plot: At the very end of WWII (but after the official end of the German occupation of Denmark), during the days of May 7-8 1945 Soviet planes bomb Nexø and Rønne on the Danish island of Bornholm. Two eye witnesses reflect upon the events.
title: Da bomberne faldt på Bornholm
plot_es: At the very end of WWII (but after the official end of the German occupation of Denmark), during the days of May 7-8 1945 Soviet planes bomb Nexø and Rønne on the Danish island of Bornholm. Two eye witnesses reflect upon the events.
